short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fuzzy-finder for methods, fields etc., in documentation pages for programming languages and software development frameworks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DocJump provides a fuzzy finder (on hitting Ctrl+Shift+j) for methods, fields etc. in documentation pages for popular software development libraries and frameworks including Java, Node.js and Python.
